name: Defense from the Martian Assault
description:
A game made by  Me, Voidsenight and Ilovechlorine. For the Wowie 4.0 gamejam.
I took care of the programming, Unity stuff and Game design, along with the bad artwork.
Voidsenight helped with game design and did all the good art work.
Ilovechlorine wrote the banger soundtrack.
This was the first time I collaborated with others. And honestly, it went pretty well.
I was crunched up for time so there's a bunch of things missing. Mostly QoL features.
